document.description: Examples of the lemma full from the MASC project for FN annotation
document.name: full

sentence.text: My heart is full of delight ! "
For ten years he had lived this lonely life , his heart full of sadness and his head full of dark dreams .
` Yesterday my heart was full of sadness .
My mind was full of happiness and relief .
His fervent soul was full of sorrow for the world and its sinfulness .
Yet she still finds herself full of frustration and anger towards him .
She was restless , full of ineffectual undirected anger .
Gateshead were hoping for a home draw , but they will go into the game full of confidence after defeating 1990 winners Barrow in the second round on Saturday .
Despite being taken aback by the cost of kitting ourselves out , we went along to the local diving club , full of enthusiasm .
The marketing man on the other hand is full of enthusiasm for this latest onslaught on the market and most certainly does not think his new " baby " is at all routine .
He was full of enthusiasm , rushing around fetching paper and a new packet of soft lead pencils .
You are afraid and full of excitement at thoughts of what you might find .
I was a different man , full of strength and excitement .
And although he seemed full of hope for the future , somehow I thought he would never be very rich or successful .
Full of hope , I took the watch in to a smart business in the Rue du Rh√¥ne , where it was examined by a stately manager .
Well you can see for yourself on Friday , when we meet up with the main man on the golf course ; he 's full of fun and full of hope .
She 's still full of the joys of spring .
Banished to the cabin , she lay there full of joy , feeling the crazy desire of the old boat to put out once again into mid-stream .
When we gather together in Church on christmas Day around the alter with the priest we are full of joy .
Aunt Nessy had been upstairs , but hearing voices she came down , and seeing me ran towards me , as lightly and softly as a little bouncing ball , her eyes full of love and welcome .
Not that I 'd exactly been full of brotherly love for him before I 'd left the town .
Many Little Sisters are preparing to go back to school this fall full of hope and with a positive outlook .

She strikes me as able , full of energy , and yet womanly .
